select.id: get減免減額対象者判定用根拠作成対象者_負担限度額認定

mapper.select:
SELECT "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" as "hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbV4001JukyushaDaicho" WHERE "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" <= #{基準日}
AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."kyuSochishaFlag" = TRUE
AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."kyuSochishaFlag" = FALSE
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei" WHERE "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."hihokenshaNo" = "hihokenshaNo" AND #{前年度の開始日} <= "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AND "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" <= #{前年度の終了日} AND "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."ketteiKubun" = '1' )
AND EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei" WHERE "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."hihokenshaNo" = "hihokenshaNo" AND #{前年度の開始日} <= "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AND "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" <= #{前年度の終了日} AND "DbT4018KaigoHokenFutanGendogakuNintei"."ketteiKubun" = '1' )
AND EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" WHERE "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AND "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."nyushoYMD" <= #{基準日} AND ((#{基準日} <= "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD") OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" IS NULL) OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" = '')) )
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" WHERE "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AND "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."nyushoYMD" <= #{基準日} AND ((#{基準日} <= "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD") OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" IS NULL) OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" = '')) )

select.id: get減免減額対象者判定用根拠作成対象者_利用者負担額減額

mapper.select:
SELECT "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" as "hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbV4001JukyushaDaicho" WHERE "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" <= #{基準日}
AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."kyuSochishaFlag" = TRUE
AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."kyuSochishaFlag" = FALSE
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" WHERE "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = "hihokenshaNo" AND #{前年度の開始日} <= "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AND "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" <= #{前年度の終了日} AND "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."ketteiKubun" = '1' )
AND EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" WHERE "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = "hihokenshaNo" AND #{前年度の開始日} <= "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AND "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" <= #{前年度の終了日} AND "DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."ketteiKubun" = '1' )
AND EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" WHERE "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AND "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."nyushoYMD" <= #{基準日} AND ((#{基準日} <= "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD") OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" IS NULL) OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" = '')) )
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" WHERE "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AND "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."nyushoYMD" <= #{基準日} AND ((#{基準日} <= "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD") OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" IS NULL) OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" = '')) )

select.id: get減免減額対象者判定用根拠作成対象者_訪問介護利用者負担額減額

mapper.select:
SELECT "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" as "hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbV4001JukyushaDaicho" WHERE "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" <= #{基準日}
AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."kyuSochishaFlag" = TRUE
AND "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."kyuSochishaFlag" = FALSE
NOT EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" WHERE "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = "hihokenshaNo" AND #{前年度の開始日} <= "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AND "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" <= #{前年度の終了日} AND "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."ketteiKubun" = '1' )
AND EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" WHERE "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = "hihokenshaNo" AND #{前年度の開始日} <= "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AND "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" <= #{前年度の終了日} AND "DbT4016HomonKaigoRiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."ketteiKubun" = '1' )
AND EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" WHERE "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AND "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."nyushoYMD" <= #{基準日} AND ((#{基準日} <= "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD") OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" IS NULL) OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" = '')) )
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" WHERE "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = "DbV4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AND "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."nyushoYMD" <= #{基準日} AND ((#{基準日} <= "DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD") OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" IS NULL) OR ("DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho"."taishoShoriYMD" = '')) )
